channel.title: Videos on your psp!
channel.description:
[CENTER]DOWNLOADS YOU NEED [url=http://www.psp-saves.net/main/modules.php?name=Downloads&d_op=ns_getit&cid=3&lid=10&type=url#get]Video converter[/url][/CENTER]
Connect your PSP to your computer or read the PSP
In the main root of the PSP(D:\ or any letter your PSP is)Make a new folder called [code]MP_ROOT[/CODE]
go to D:\MP_ROOT and make a new folder called [code]100MNV01[/code]
Go to the file the vid converter is and run the setup.
Highlight the one that has [code]MP4 for psp(direct, renamed)[/code] or something like that
Drag the video file into where it sais to and wait for it to convert(remember where it stores the converted videos)
copy the new converted video into [code]D:\MP_ROOT\100MNV01[/CODE]
Enjoy the vids ;D

item.title: Videos on your psp!
item.dc:creator: @cheese939 cheese939
item.description:
@cheese939 wrote:

Or you could download Psp Video 9 here: http://www.pspvideo9.com/
It has a built in video converter and you can easily move your files to and from Psp with it
And its FREE

Read full topic

item.title: Videos on your psp!
item.dc:creator: @craids craids
item.description:
@craids wrote:

[CENTER]DOWNLOADS YOU NEED
Video converter[/CENTER]

Connect your PSP to your computer or read the PSP

In the main root of the PSP(D:\ or any letter your PSP is)Make a new folder called MP_ROOT

go to D:\MP_ROOT and make a new folder called 100MNV01

Go to the file the vid converter is and run the setup.

Highlight the one that has MP4 for psp(direct, renamed) or something like that

Drag the video file into where it sais to and wait for it to convert(remember where it stores the converted videos)

copy the new converted video into D:\MP_ROOT\100MNV01

Enjoy the vids ;D
